getQuestionOrderBeanComparatorByOrder

private java.util.Comparator<QuestionOrderBean> getQuestionOrderBeanComparatorByOrder()
Get a comparator that can be used to order a list of instances of QuestionOrder by its order.

Note that can't be used with lists with null instances.
